Recommended_Action: MODERATE RISK: Share a community resource flyer and suggest pantry access. Recommend monthly check-ins with school liaison or counselor.
MODERATE RISK: Share a community resource flyer and suggest pantry access. Recommend monthly check-ins with school liaison or counselor.
LOW RISK: No immediate action required. Send general awareness material about support programs and keep household on routine observation list.
URGENT: Connect with food pantry and emergency housing resources immediately. Assign a case manager and conduct a home visit or wellness check if possible.
